markets.display_name: Medium To Large Enterprises With Large Numbers Of Skilled Workers
markets.name: Medium to Large Enterprises with large numbers of skilled workers

product_desc: OneWork	helps organizations	develop a passion and soul by redefining	 what engagement means. Reform company culture and attract and retain	good people. The platform connects hundreds and thousands of employees within any given department in an organization, with similar tastes and interests, for the many who wish to have close relationships at work, perhaps even a best friend or mentor. OneWork creates an amiable culture that encourages innovation in all	 areas and promotes employee happiness, well-being, and in turn, engagement.
high_concept: An online platform designed for people of the corporate world to connect with one another
name: OneWork
